essential-container.msg: ⚠️ Essential Mod Not Supported Essential is in absolutely no way supported by Re-Console+. It introduces long-standing GUI issues, in-game issues, performance problems and a lot more. If you would like to play multiplayer for free, open to LAN and you will recieve a link you can use for your friends to play with you! We also object heavily to Essentials usage of in-game microtransactions, in an otherwise completely free and open source modding community.

embeddium.msg: ⚠️ Embeddium Not Supported Embeddium is not supported by Re-Console+.

notenoughcrashes.msg: ⚠️ Not Enough Crashes installed You have added the Not Enough Crashes mod. This may cause critical stability errors.

legacy-mipmaps.msg: ⚠️ Legacy Mipmaps installed Legacy Mipmaps is abandoned and is not supported!

noisium.msg: ⚠️ Noisium not supported Noisium is not supported, as the mod does not have significant performance boost and is superseded by other mods.

faster-random.msg: ⚠️ Faster Random installed Faster Random is not supported.
